name: Get Your Controls Back!
description:
You had just gotten your platformer character home when a glitch caused it to be sent back to start and become separated from all its controls except for the left arrow. Go get your controls back!

This game was made for GDevelop Jam 3, Separation. The jam was 9 days, but I did not get this idea until the last day and a half. I will probably tweak it a bit after the jam and have plans to add mobile commands.

Lilou link: https://liluo.io/games/325121d4-bdbe-4993-ba69-4efea7f61da3

Downloadable versions are available for PC, Mac and Linux.
